pullrequest.title: Model: add a way to get scoped sensor name.

content.raw:
Thanks for the pull request! I started a few CI jobs:

* [Xenial no gpu](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-none/471/)
* [Xenial Nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/120/)
* [homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1027/)

I mainly want to make sure the test passes and that adding a new model to the existing test world didn't break any existing tests.
content.html:
Thanks for the pull request! I started a few CI jobs:

  • Xenial no gpu
  • Xenial Nvidia
  • homebrew

I mainly want to make sure the test passes and that adding a new model to the existing test world didn't break any existing tests.

pullrequest.title: Model: add a way to get scoped sensor name.

content.raw: Some nested model tests are failing due to the added model in the test world.
content.html: Some nested model tests are failing due to the added model in the test world.

pullrequest.title: Model: add a way to get scoped sensor name.

content.raw:
The tests are now passing for me locally, I started a new build just in case:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/122/
content.html:
The tests are now passing for me locally, I started a new build just in case:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/122/

pullrequest.title: Model: add a way to get scoped sensor name.

content.raw:
Still have tests that failed... 
But ModelListWidget_TEST.LinkProperties and gzTest.Model are passing on my computer.
INTEGRATION_world_reset.test_ran too, even I get errors about simbody and bullet. And it don't use deeply_nested_models.world  but nested_models.world, so this PR should impact it.
content.html: Still have tests that failed... But ModelListWidget_TEST.LinkProperties and gzTest.Model are passing on my computer. INTEGRATION_world_reset.test_ran too, even I get errors about simbody and bullet. And it don't use deeply_nested_models.world but nested_models.world, so this PR should impact it.

pullrequest.title: Model: add a way to get scoped sensor name.

content.raw:
These changes are breaking some tests which use this world file:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/120/

I think moving the sensor to `model_03` should fix that, but it should be tried locally to be sure before we run another Jenkins round.
content.html:
These changes are breaking some tests which use this world file:

http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/120/

I think moving the sensor to model_03 should fix that, but it should be tried locally to be sure before we run another Jenkins round.
